title: Possible methods to fix auto-fill
body:
I as many others probably hate auto-fill. Sure of course what is not to hate, you put in your favorite roles you get excited, get in a game and WHAM you are support. Or you get your role, someone leaves lobby then you get Support next pop. 

Well i have some ideas i think would help make this a lot less irritating. As i understand why we get it and that its to lower que times.

1. Make it so if this game is the last one before getting deranked, you aren't forced any roles you haven't selected- Much like with promo matches you aren't forced to play a role you have zero clue how to play. This would also help decrease the level of tilt when you actually do lose the game.

2. Add a selection method where you don't ever get auto but you have a longer que time to find your role. 

3. Make auto-filled games impact your LP loss by half or 3/4 as long as it can tell you are trying (maybe tie it into the mastery score system? A and higher = less for a loss?).

There are many other ideas others have said over the time its been in the game. I just think some times it is silly getting auto when its important you play a role you know. Like my first example.

replies.body: or you could just deal with it. pick order used to be a thing and if you were last unless there was a dedicated support main on the team, you would get support if you were last pick. Playing different roles helps you learnt he game more as well.
